title: What element is most. commonly used in items found at home? - Quora

response.answer_text: Carbon or hydrogen. Carbon by weight hydrogen by molarity. Almost everything organic (wood cloth paper plastics foods) are mostly carbon saturated with hydrogen. Seeing on average you to have two hydrogen for every one carbon you would have more hydrogen atoms but carbon weighs 14 times more than hydrogen it would be it by weight.
Nitrogen, Your home should definitely open to the atmosphere if your home is on earth. However, it depends on what you are meaning by the term of common (by molarity, volume, mass & etc.)
